param.dialogReference:
Number of Categories

Grid, output

number of different categories (unique values) within search area

param.name: DIVERSITY
param.dialogReference:
Diversity

distance weighted average of the number of different categories for distance classes

param.name: CONNECTEDAVG
param.dialogReference:
Averaged Connectivity

Grid, output

average size of the area covered by each category that occurs within search area

param.dialogReference:
Normalize

Choice

[0] no

[1] by number of cells

[2] by area size

param.dialogReference:
Kernel Type

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Square

[1] Circle

The kernel's shape.

param.dialogReference:
Weighting Function

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] no distance weighting

Bandwidth

tool.summary: Grid based analysis of diversity. It is assumed that the input grid provides a classification (i.e. not a contiuous field). For each cell it counts the number of different categories (classes) as well as the connectivity within the chosen search window.
